import React from 'react' const RecipeCard =props => { return (
props.removeRecipe(props.recipe._id)} className="remove">Delete props.saveRecipe(props._id)} className="save">Save props.editRecipe(props._id)} className="edit">edit

{props.recipe.title}

Ingredients:
    {props.recipe.ingrediants.split(",").map((ingrediant, index) => (
  • {ingrediant}
    • ))}
Instructions:

{props.recipe.instructions}

) } export default RecipeCard
